comment: I found that there was a lot of work, 4 field trips and write-up on them each (this was an online class) 2 pg. ppr, comparing a social issue in two different religions. Dr. Boeri was very quick to respond to emails and she joined in the discussion with helpful suggestions.I was worried about some of the negative comments but don't fear.

I took her for SOCI 4200 & SOCI 4442. I did not learn anything in her classes. Lots of busy work, but if you do it, you'll get an A. Open book final exams. Online quizzes. Attendance not mandatory. She's really cool as a person, not as a teacher. Of course she is liberal. This is the sociology dep't at a university.
Do not take her if you are conservative! You will find her ideas and views ridiculous and rude!

Nutty as a fruit-cake! And mean too! Pls don't take research w/ her. Take w/ a CJ profesor if u have to. I'm now in grad school and her reputation is infamous here(GSU). She talks very badly about other faculty and students, so be careful what u share w/ her.
Absence of chili-peppers casts doubt on previous ratings.  Come on!  She's not a coddler, and she has some edgy ways of thinking, but hey, this is college!
I hated this profesor!  I would not take her again if you paid me!!!!!!!!!
One of the most negative people I have ever met.

I learned virtually nothing- I just read the books and showed up to get my attendance grade. Her "field trips" were haphazard and had us staying in downtown Atlanta until 9 pm and didn't even take into account that gas was $4 a gallon! Wasn't helpful at all and was disrespectful when you had discussions in class.

She's sort of strange. She is definately set in her ways. She assigned weekly 1-2 page essays based on an exercise in each chapter. 12 were assigned, she took the best 10 grades. Then you are required to write 2 research papers by going on field trips (choice of on or off campus). Although the class was easy, I wouldn't recommend her.
Why is this women a teacher at a University?

Take this teacher if you want to hear someone bash KSU, the faculty, and the students the whole entire class period.  She doesn’t teach, just whines and complains.  At first I thought “this is the meanest teacher ever!” but I later realized she is just tremendously unhappy and takes it out on her students.  Her clarity can be incomprehensible, and

Nuts! Unclear instruction, wishy-washy, says one thing then changes her mind. Said we could use book for test, then chged her mind, made us wait 1 full hour b4 hand. Everyone had a prblm with her. Test ridiculously hard. Didn’t learn crap! Critiqued presentations in front of class immediately afterwards! Disrespectful, impolite, & unprofessional.
She is a wonderful teacher and really cares about her students.  You will learn a lot from her.

She does have some weird sex hangups...Always talking about it in class.  However, she is a much better option than some of the other prof's in Soci at KSU.  I have taken two classes with her and I learned a good deal in both classes.  I don't agree with most of her veiws, but she doesn't push them on anyone.

It is a compromise. Her class is fairly easy, but she is a terrible professor. Her views are very strange, but don't dare go against her. And she makes you go to stupid field trips like sex shops and whatnot. I didn't learn a thing...take anyone else!

Very weird person, very opinionated. If you dont see it her way, she looks down on you. Fairly easy though. I hope to not take again just because of strange outlook on subjects. Makes you go to very uncomfortable places for "field trips" (sex shops, gay bars).
No Comments
Very unorganized, unclear, and strange.  Easy class..just do the work and you'll get an A.

She is eccentric, and she is a flower child. Easy class if you do everything she says. Never argue with her, because she thinks she knows everything. Also, if you wrong her, she will pegionhole you, so you might as well drop the class. Other than that, she's alright.

This class is extremely easy.  Show up, write four simple one page papers and get an A.  Doctor Boeri obviously loves sociology, so class discussions are fun.  You could easily get good grades and never show up, but unfortantly she takes role.  This class was a breath of fresh air.

Easiest class ever. She gives you answers to tests. A few papers (nothing hard), group assignment. Take Soci 2105 with Boeri you wont regret it. I missed class so much but I still got an A, she is a hippie but in no way she dislikes anyone.

Very easy but interesting class.  Only one paper with no real page requirement.  Tests are multiple choice, and she tells you what to expect.  Uses a good, informative book that's helpful when you miss class.  Sometimes can't explain her opinions.

Is eccentric, but a terrific teacher of research process and statistical translation.  Her lectures lack focus but there is still a great deal that you can learn from her.  It may not be on the test but it's valuable.

This teacher has an attitude, and a dislike of the mainstream.  Thinks drugs are cool, thinks everyone needs sex, and tries to be a hippie.  Likes the far out students, but slams students who are traditional and seeking good grades.
